CustomField.description: Billing Type. This value is inherited from the Quote. For any in advance billing, the order will be excluded to a separate batch to avoid it from being picked up on by any invoice run. Billing in advance requires the 'Bill Now' to be used in the Order.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Billing Type. This value is inherited from the Quote. For any in advance billing, the order will be excluded to a separate batch to avoid it from being picked up on by any invoice run. Billing in advance requires the 'Bill Now' to be used in the Order.
CustomField.label: Billing Type
